FuncDef: The display ipoe session-id mac-address option-82 command displays the session ID allocated to the user with a specified MAC address and Option82.
CLIs: display ipoe session-id mac-address <mac-address> option-82 { option-82 } &<1-200>

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a user MAC address.
The value is in the format of H-H-H. Each H is a 4-digit hexadecimal number.

Specifies a Option82.
The value is a string of 2 to 400 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When one-to-many mapping between one MAC address and many sessions is enabled, to check the session ID allocated to the user with a specified MAC address and Option82, run the display ipoe session-id mac-address option-82 command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
